name: Advanced Media Technologies
tag_list: advertising, web, digital, graphic, design, online-marketing, trivandrum, kerala, india, interactive-marketing
overview:
Amtec is a new age design studio that aims to provide innovative, workable and creative solutions for branding, brand development and brand sustainability. With operations spanning in India and US, Amtec boasts of an expertise in graphic design, interactive design and online branding.

Amtec over the years has constantly maintained its significant reputation of delivering optimum, creative and financially viable e-solutions and has created a trusted clientele ranging from prominent creative studios to Global 2000 companies.

The spectrum of service offered by Amtec includes branding stationery and print collaterals, state of the art websites, interactive CD/DVDs; high end e-based applications for online marketing and interactive new media technologies like E-brochures, e-manuals, e-presentations and most modern digital marketing tools like the ‘Impact movie’.

The eclectic Amtec team of highly motivated and creative professionals consists of talented designers, artists and programmers, who work in tandem with the client feed back to deliver exclusive designs that are creative, aesthetic and technically sound, integrating the best in technology on an ongoing basis.

The ‘Amtec creativity’ is accompanied by a hands-on and conscientious approach in giving shape to ideas and bringing them to life. Innovation combined with what works best for the client, makes Amtec unique.
